problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AB=5,AC=4,若把Rt△ABC绕直线AC旋转一周,则所得圆锥的侧面积等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AB = N_1, AC = N_2, if Rt△ABC is rotated around the straight line AC once, the lateral area of ​​the obtained cone is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB=5,AC=4∴由勾股定理得:BC=3∴底面的周长是:6π∴圆锥的侧面积等\frac{1}{2}×6π×5=15π,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查圆锥侧面积的求法．注意圆锥的高,母线长,底面半径组成直角三角形．
